Subject: Re: Lets Get Dangerous !
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

The smoke finally clearing, Motormaster sees his target escaping, then sees
one turned, the one that shot him in the back, his eyes flaring at Dark
Convoy. He soars towards him and tries to grab his arms, to hold him in
positiong for Killfest.
